Courses.title: Humare courses
Courses.introduction: Bloom ke courses humein trauma se nipatne ke liye tailored jankaari, takneekein aur positive shabd dete hain. Vo humein ek surakshit aur empowering space dete hain jahan humein seekhne, pratibimb (reflect) karne aur process karne mein protsahit kiya jata hai.
Courses.noCourses: Abhi dikhane ke liye koi course nahi hai. There are no courses to display right now. Agar yeh sahi nahi lagta, toh dobara prayas karein ya fir Bloom mein team se sampark karien.

courseDetail.introductionDescription: Introduction video dekhiye ya <transcriptLink>video transcript</transcriptLink> padh lijiye

sessionDetail.videoDescription: Video dekhiye ya fir <transcriptLink>video transcript</transcriptLink> padh lijiye.

chat.title: Humare saath soch vichaar kariye
chat.description: Yadi aap iss sessions par apne vichaar share karna chahte hai toh Bloom team apko sunna pasand karegi!
chat.videoIntro: Humari online chat kese kaam karti hai, iske bare mein aur jaanein:
chat.detailPrivacy: Aapke messages niji aur surakshit hai, vo sirf Bloom team pad sakti hain aur aap gumnaan rehte hain.
chat.detailTimezone: Hum kai alag-alag timezones mein kaam karte hain, isliye aapko humse 6 ghanto ke andar response milna chahiye, aur samay 24 ghanton se adhik nahi hoga.
chat.detailLanguage: Hum humesha Anghrezi aur Spanish mein uplabdh hain, lekin humari team ke sadasya French, Italian, Hindi, Arabic aur Bangla bhi bolte hain. Humein aapke liye unke saath baat karne ki vyvastha karne mein khushi hogi.
chat.detailLegal: Yadi aap ek sakriya kanooni mamle se guzar rahe hain, toh vichaar karein ki aap hamare saath kya share karte hain kyuki yeh kabhi-kabhi aapke mamle ko prabhavit kar sakta hai.
chat.detailImmediateHelp: Yadi aap asann khatre mein hai, toh kripya menu mein "tatkaal sahayata" par jaye taki aapki sahayata ke liye sahi seva mil sake.

accessGuard.title: Yeh course content uplabhd nahi hai.
accessGuard.introduction: Aapke Bloom account mein iss course content ki access shaamil nahi hai. Apne <contactLink>courses</contactLink> par vapas jaiye.

errors.completeSessionError: Iss session ko khatam mark karne mein error aa raha hai. Thodi der baad dubara prayas kariye.
